name: Gem Grab
description:
Release of my first pico game in development.

X - Grab a gem (You can grab multiple of the same colour, you cannot grab rocks)

Z - Drops gems

Left and Right moves the grabber.

Link 3 gems or more to destroy them, rocks can only be destroyed by destroying the gems under them. If you destroy the special coloured rocks it will remove all gems of that colour from the screen.

I will provide source and platform binarys once completed.

Update:

  • Started adding in animations, grabbing and dropping is now animated
  • Hiscore tracking added
  • Bug fix - last update broke the rocks and made them indestructable
